## How to test / QA

## Checklist (fill before requesting review)
- [ ] I have linked the related issue (e.g., "Closes #123" or "Refs #123")
- [ ] All new files are placed under an appropriate `assets/` path
- [ ] File names and directory follow the naming conventions
- [ ] Images are optimized and within size limits
- [ ] Font/licenses for third-party assets are documented
- [ ] I updated any relevant documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] CI is green
